Params: {3: 'A heavy, transparent veil hangs before her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's been so long, so long that I thought Commandant<phonetic=didn't forget>forgot</phonetic> about me or something...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I... I just want to stay here on Earth and live together with <phonetic=Nanami...>Commandant</phonetic> and all these people.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami gets along great with <phonetic=Nanami!>Commandant</phonetic>! <phonetic=Nanami!>Commandant</phonetic> never gets angry at Nanami! Everything's gonna be fine!", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami will lead the mechanoid brethren through this catastrophe, and Nanami won't give up on saving <phonetic=Nanami>Commandant</phonetic> or finding a new singularity.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Something must have happened to <phonetic=Nanami>Commandant</phonetic>, but Nanami doesn't know how to help <phonetic=Nanami>Commandant</phonetic>."}
{2: '(Strike the barrier with all your might)', 3: '32'}
{3: 'Thin cracks begin to appear on the transparent barrier...'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '<phonetic=Nanami>Commandant</phonetic>! Wait for Nanami! Nanami is coming for you!'}
{3: 'You slam your fist against the unyielding transparent barrier.'}
{3: 'The cracks in the transparent barrier grow wider...'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '<phonetic=Nanami>Humans</phonetic> are always creating miracles, and so is <phonetic=Nanami>Commandant</phonetic>!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Wait for me, Commandant... I will definitely find you...'}
{3: 'As Nanami calls out from the other side, the cracks in the transparent barrier grow even wider...'}
{2: '(Strike the cracked transparent barrier with all your might)', 3: '82'}
{1: '7', 2: '<size=80>Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami Nanami</size>', 4: '-475', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'Having been forgotten in the river of time, Nanami struggles to open her weary eyes and grasp those hands that reach out to her through time and space.'}
{3: "Perhaps she's been deceived by illusions many times before, but no matter how often, she still rushes toward the commandant without hesitation."}
{1: '1', 3: "This time, however, it's not some deception this time."}
{3: 'Nanami bounces up and down with excitement, her arms tightening around your waist and back—each call of your name carrying countless emotions.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I thought I'd be the one to find you! How did you find me? Was it because of the secret weapon I left behind?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Thirty-odd years have passed, but Nanami is still every bit as lively as a bird, chirping away with endless questions.'}
{2: '(Briefly explain to Nanami how you got here)', 3: '124'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's a long journey... Bet you're super tired, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But don't worry! Nanami is here now!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But, argh, I swear I told Cervantes to keep my new frame a complete secret!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I was totally looking forward to showing it to you when we meet again...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ahem! Well, I guess you're looking right at it now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "After a brief chat, the two of you catch up on each other's current situations."}
{2: 'How did you end up trapped here, Nanami?', 3: '136'}
{3: "You've practically relived Nanami's journey with her, but this crucial detail still eluded you."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I\'ve been thinking about it, you know. Maybe it\'s because there wasn\'t an "anchor point."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I was able to travel back to reality in the past using Mecha Babushka as both a medium and anchor point, but now...', 4: '1'}

{3: 'As Gestalt voyages with Babylonia, Nanami, now a new kind of Gestalt, possesses sufficient computing power but has lost the anchor point needed to tether herself to the timeline from which she came.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hehe, if I'm gonna be stuck here, at least I've got you with me, Commandant. This isn't too bad at all!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami's consciousness can decay over time since it's mechanical, but your consciousness, Commandant, is that of a human's...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ugh, we still need to find a way out of here... But what else can we do? I've already searched through a lot of time shards...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'You... want to be my anchor point?', 4: '1'}
{3: "After a brief moment of contemplation, Nanami's face lights up with sudden joy."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Commandant's M.I.N.D. is super powerful, not to mention all the bonds you have!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Could this be... the singularity we've been waiting for?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the sudden inspiration hits her like lightning, Nanami quickly pulls up a large display screen.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami made these! Tools that will allow us to run simulations right here!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami named it The Big Eater because simulating it alone ate up so much of Nanami's computing power...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Let Nanami set the parameters! Let me set you up as the new starting point for the simulation as you are...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The timelines are a tangled web of possibilities, with "Commandant has made it out of the Hetero Tower" being the sole variable.'}
{3: 'Only by grasping both this variable and the singularity can we hope to reach the boundary of dimensional ascension.'}
{3: 'But... is all of this a simulation? Or is it actually happening?'}
{3: 'The threads of fate interweave between the Nanami and you. No one knows anymore what kind of world you have become entangled in.'}
